name: persist-json
description: Persist an object as JSON file

scripts.test: camo-purge ; xo --space 4 --no-esnext --ignore=test.js && node_modules/.bin/nyc node_modules/.bin/mocha test.js && node_modules/.bin/nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | node_modules/.bin/coveralls --force

author: Sebastian Raff <hq@ccu.io> https://github.com/hobbyquaker
